column1: 4.  The TAC has failed to take cognizance of the fact that the commission

column2: Commissioner  General  of  Inland  Revenue  was  based  and  upon  which
tax  and  penalties  were  computed  was  derived  from  eight  companies,
including  Mabey  &  Johnson  Ltd,  UK,  asset out  in  the  detailed  analysis
on commission at pages 82, &86 of the TAC brief.
